body_html:
solved it by implementing a custom op.
A really simple CTC algorithm is presented by Hwang [1]. Its a beam search through the RNN output. Integrating a char-bigram LM into this algorithm is easy.
For a word-level LM the CTC Token Passing algorithm [2] can be used.

[1] https://arxiv.org/pdf/1601.06581.pdf
[2] https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~graves/phd.pdf

body:
solved it by implementing a custom op. 
A really simple CTC algorithm is presented by Hwang [1]. Its a beam search through the RNN output. Integrating a char-bigram LM into this algorithm is easy.
For a word-level LM the CTC Token Passing algorithm [2] can be used.

[1] https://arxiv.org/pdf/1601.06581.pdf
[2] https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~graves/phd.pdf
